pullrequest.title: Stop the world from a plugin

content.raw:
Interesting, thanks for the pull request. It would be great to also add an example (system?) plugin which stops the world, and a test where that is triggered. Sounds reasonable?

I'd also be curious to know how you're using this. Are you able to start a new world after a world is stopped?
content.html:
Interesting, thanks for the pull request. It would be great to also add an example (system?) plugin which stops the world, and a test where that is triggered. Sounds reasonable?

I'd also be curious to know how you're using this. Are you able to start a new world after a world is stopped?
